snippet: Nine renowned researchers are to arrive on Friday as part of the Institute for Advanced Study and a strategy to promote excellence at Texas A&M University.
lead_paragraph: Nine renowned researchers are to arrive on Friday as part of the Institute for Advanced Study and a strategy to promote excellence at Texas A&M University.

headline.main: In ‘Excellence’ Push, A&M Welcomes 9 New Research Fellows
headline.print_headline: In ‘Excellence’ Push, A&M Welcomes 9 New Research Fellows
